name: Nail Challenge
description:
So ridiculous! But oh, so fun! This is Nail Challenge, and it is the girl fight challenge of the century! You won’t want to miss it!

Nails at the ready. These women are ready for war — a perfectly manicured war, that is. Draw a nail path to make those talons your weapons. Then it’s time to battle. Run at your opponent and take them down using only those amazing nails.

This is a finger fight like no other! Are you up to the challenge?
